channel.title: Virtual box guest screen resolution not adjusting
channel.description: On my old VB release i used to be able to grab the bottom right angle and adjust the guest screen to fill in the program window. After a fresh install +extention the resolutuin of the guest wont change. I have 3d accerelation enabled in the dispay option in VB settings. "Auto resize guest display" is unavaliable to click(it's in grey). Any suggestions?

item.title: Virtual box guest screen resolution not adjusting
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This bug and a workaround for it is documented here:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Troubleshooting#Screen_Resolution_Bug

Read full topic
item.source: Virtual box guest screen resolution not adjusting

item.title: Virtual box guest screen resolution not adjusting
item.dc:creator: needanswers
item.description:
On my old VB release i used to be able to grab the bottom right angle and adjust the guest screen to fill in the program window. After a fresh install +extention the resolutuin of the guest wont change. I have 3d accerelation enabled in the dispay option in VB settings. “Auto resize guest display” is unavaliable to click(it’s in grey). Any suggestions?
